text: David Draiman (born March 13, 1973) is an American singer and a founding member of heavy metal rock band Disturbed. ==Discography== ===Disturbed=== ====Albums==== *Perfect Insanity EP (1998) *Stupify EP (1998) *The Sickness (2000) *Believe (2002) *Ten Thousand Fists (2005) *Indestructible (2008) *Asylum (2010) ====Singles==== *2000: "Stupify" *2000: "Voices" *2000: "Down with the Sickness" *2002: "Awaken" *2002: "Devour" *2002: "Darkness" *2002: "Remember" *2002: "Liberate" *2002: "Prayer" *2005: "Guarded" *2005: "Stricken" *2006: "Land of Confusion" *2008: "Inside the Fire" *2008: "Indestructible" *2009: "The Night" *2010: "Another Way to Die" *2010: "The Animal" *2011: "Warrior" ==== DVD ==== * 2002: M.O.L. * 2004: Music as a Weapon (CD+DVD) ==== Music Videos ==== *2000: "Voices" *2000: "Stupify" *2002: "Remember" *2002: "Prayer" *2005: "Stricken" *2006: "Land of Confusion" *2008: "Inside the Fire" *2008: "Indestructible" *2009: "The Night" *2010: "Another Way to Die" *2010: "Asylum" *2010: "The Animal" ===Other=== Forsaken (2002) â€“ a song released on the Queen of the Damned soundtrack == Other websites == * Official Website Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:American Jews Category:American rock singers Category:Musicians from Brooklyn
title: David Draiman
